meanings.definition: Detoxicants: substances that remove toxic substances from the body.
meanings.sent1: The detoxicants helped cleanse his body of harmful toxins.
meanings.sent2: She took detoxicants to rid her system of poisons.
meanings.sent3: The detoxicants worked like magic to purify his system.
meanings.sent4: Her detoxicants acted as a shield against harmful substances.
meanings.sent5: The detoxicants were like little warriors fighting off toxins in his body.

meanings.definition: Detoxicants: agents that neutralize or counteract toxins.
meanings.sent1: The detoxicants in the medicine helped to neutralize the harmful effects.
meanings.sent2: He used detoxicants to counteract the poison he accidentally ingested.
meanings.sent3: The detoxicants danced around the toxins, rendering them harmless.
meanings.sent4: Her detoxicants were like superheroes battling the evil toxins.
meanings.sent5: The detoxicants swooped in like knights to save the day from the toxins.
